title: Plantrade
description: An online peer-to-peer platform for buying and selling houseplants
features: displays listing information publicly, including listing title, description, price, and plant species, through a Vue app, state managed with Vuex and using components from Vuesax
securely registers and authenticates users with JWT
leverages a search algorithm that queries by listing titles, descriptions, and plant species
enables authenticated users to add items to cart, made possible with a relational PostgreSQL database
allows authenticated users to post listings with images, stored in an AWS S3 bucket
generates a secure stripe-powered checkout session, with listing information filtered from a Node.js and Express server

title: Reviewr
description: A social networking site collaboratively built around user generated music & album reviews
features: displays album reviews on a feed built with React
securely authenticates users with JWT verified by a Node.js and Express server
utilizes a third-party music API for albums, album information, and music previews
allows full CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operation on user-submitted reviews
dynamically calculates album average score based on all user-submitted reviews, stored in a relational PostgreSQL database

title: SpaceX Flights
description: An inter-planetary flight booking system inspired by and designed for SpaceX
features: displays flights, flight information and ticket information on a React front-end connected to a Node.js and express back-end
search algorithm queries either flight origin, flight destination, or both, based on data stored in a MongoDB cloud database
dynamically calculates ticket prices based on flight duration and flight privileges (economy, business, first)
generates a unique ticket identified and verifiable by a QR code

title: I Love Hue
description: An inter-planetary flight booking system inspired by and designed for SpaceX
features: allows authenticated users to post listings with images, stored in an AWS S3 bucket
generates a secure stripe-powered checkout session, with listing information filtered from a Node.js and Express server
